  • Constructor Details

    • ClasspathBasedConfig

      public ClasspathBasedConfig(String primaryConfigFileName, String secondaryConfigFileName)
      Parameters:
      primaryConfigFileName - this File will be search firstly in the classpath and will be used. If this file is found in Classpath, the search-Process is stopped.
      secondaryConfigFileName - if the primaryConfigFileName is not found in the classpath, this file will be search in class-path and will be used.
